title: Aron Pokédex: stats, moves, evolution & locations | Pokémon Database
text: Aron Aron is a Steel/Rock type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. Base stats The ranges shown on the right are for a level 100 Pokémon. Maximum values are based on a beneficial nature, 252 EVs, 31 IVs; minimum values are based on a hindering nature, 0 EVs, 0 IVs. Type defenses The effectiveness of each type on Aron.
